items.title: Celebrity Traitors final briefly uploaded 24 hours early outside UK
items.description: The show was uploaded a day early by streaming service Crave in Canada, with hundreds able to watch.

items.title: Record referrals to Prevent anti-terror programme
items.description: The number of referrals to the scheme increased 27% in the year to March 2025, according to new data.

items.title: UK facing long, tough flu season, NHS chiefs warn
items.description: Vulnerable urged to come forward for flu jab quickly as virus has come early this year.

items.title: Miss Universe contestants stage walkout after organiser berates Miss Mexico
items.description: Miss Mexico, Fatima Bosch, said Nawat Itsaragrisil was 'not respectful' at a pre-pageant ceremony on Tuesday

items.title: Israel says Hamas returned body of dead Tanzanian hostage
items.description: Joshua Mollel, a 21-year-old agriculture student, was killed at Kibbutz Nir Oz during the Hamas-led 7 October 2023 attack on Israel.
